isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEATS

svcprocinfo.para: Individual air suspension driver and passenger seats, and mechanical passenger seats are available on this cab ( Figure 36 and Figure 37), with additional seat options available for the driver. Both driver and passenger seats provide many seat and back rest adjustments to assure a comfortable ride.
Refer to seat manufacturer's information for additional seat specific details.

step1.para: Remove 2 mounting bolts from each side of seat and remove seat belt brackets from seat.

Remove driver seat assembly ( Item 1, Figure 36) by removing 4 mounting bolts ( Item 3, Figure 36) which secure seat pedestal to floor. If seat is air suspension type, be sure to disconnect air line ( Item 2, Figure 36) before lifting out seat assembly.

Remove passenger seat assembly ( Item 1, Figure 37) by removing 4 mounting bolts ( Items 2 and 3, Figure 37) which secure seat frame. If seat is air suspension type, be sure to disconnect air line before lifting out seat assembly.

note.para: Clean seat suspension and adjusters as required by wiping away any grease or dirt with shop towel. Apply a light coat of multi-purpose lube to pivot points, sliding areas and rollers to assure a smooth operation on re-installation. Wipe away excess lube.

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: See base plate mounting details ( Figure 36) for various driver seat types.

step1.para: Install driver seat assembly and secure seat pedestal to the floor with 4 mounting bolts. Tighten to 23 to 27 ft-lbs. (31 to 37 Nm).
Install passenger seat assembly and secure seat frame with 4 mounting bolts. Tighten to 23 to 27 ft-lbs. (31 to 37 Nm).
Install seat belt brackets to each side of seat and install 2 mounting bolts each side. Tighten to 25 to 35 ft-lbs. (34 to 47 Nm).
Connect air lines, if so equipped. Make sure air lines do not rub suspension parts.
Check for air line leaks, if so equipped, and check seat operation.
